shortReason: stalking staff members/making them uncomfortable/trying to get personal data
longReason: The user persistently targeted staff members, including Merci (r41ny.dxy),  engaging in stalking behavior that caused significant discomfort. Attempts were made to gather personal information from staff,  violating privacy and trust within the server. Due to the severity of these actions and the distress caused to team members, the user was permanently banned to ensure the safety of the community.
